{/* Hero Section */}

Take Control of Your Health

Hypertension and COPD are leading causes of death in India. Our wearable device helps you monitor your health in real-time to reduce risks.

{/* Health Risks Section */}

Health Risks in India

Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)

Hypertension affects more than 1 in 4 adults in India. If untreated, it can lead to heart disease, stroke, and kidney failure. It's crucial to monitor your blood pressure regularly.

  • Over 200 million adults affected
  • One of the leading causes of heart disease in India
  • Annual medical costs related to hypertension exceed â‚¹5,000 crores

COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease)

COPD is a progressive lung disease that causes breathing difficulty. It's one of the leading causes of mortality in India, particularly among smokers and those exposed to pollution.

  • Over 30 million people affected
  • India has the highest number of COPD-related deaths globally
  • Major causes: Smoking, air pollution, and workplace exposure
{/* Product Description */}

Introducing SensAIra

An AI-powered wearable device that helps monitor your health in real-time. With features like heart rate monitoring, SpO2 tracking, and stress level detection, you can take proactive steps towards better health.
